LICENSES & CERTIFICATION.Name: Visual Studio Essential Training: 09 Unit Tests

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Sentiment Analysis of Twitter data using Python and NLTK
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
-> Extracted Data set on Product reviews from Twitter and Amazon Data set.
-> Separated files into Training set and Testing set.
-> Again segregated data into uni-gram, bi-gram and tri-gram and then using NLTK tools like Lemmatizer
and Enchant dictionary of Python, implemented our own algorithm, hence calculated scores and evaluated
results on the scale of -2(Highly Negative) to 2(Highly Positive).

--> Implemented using Web Socket.io and Node.js
--> Multiple users can join a Single Chat room and send messages and their current location over a persistent Internet connection
--> Bi-Directional Connection is established between Server and Client
--> Mustache and Momentjs libraries are used to render DOM elements and format time-location properties respectively.
--> Autoscrolling feature is also added for new incoming messages.

->Created Volunteer and Donor Android Application with Real time Tracking using Firebase.
->Implemented shortest path and minimum time search algorithm for the Volunteer Application.
-> Developed a server side application for NGO, who will be in overall control of food distribution.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: E Governance Portal using Visual Basics
Flight Reservation System on NetBeans  (JAVA Swing)
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
->Created a Java Swing Application for reservation of flights between India and Singapore
via different cities.
->Handled Cancellation of tickets and ticket price control (hike and fall of price) over time.
